a truly shallow gaming experience, played by a shockingly negative playerbase. I joined three lobbies before muting my audio, and all three contained both hate speech, and dangerous misinformation, that I have to think is illegal in parts of the US. There were also young children listening in two of those three lobbies, which was just awful to witness. The modding scene is cool though.
